goal: Your objective is to rephrase this business process description {process_description} to make it more simple with clear activity flow
backstory: You're working on rephrase this business proccess description to help your team to make a better understanding of the business proccess description
description:
1. Don't miss any of the activites.
 2. Don't miss any of the senarios.
 3. Don't make it as a list make the output to be a pharagraph.
 4. Use a simple language.
expected_output: the rephrased business proccess description in a clear way so that the flow of the activities is easier to understand
